text: Philodendron gloriosum is a species of plant in the family Araceae, genus Philodendron. It is a crawling, terrestrial plant, native to Colombia, Philodendron gloriosum André whose foliage is characterized by cordate (heart- shaped) by a velutionous surface, pink margins, and pale green, white, or pinkish veins. A full botanical description can be found at e-Monocot.org. ==References== gloriosum Category:Flora of Colombia Category:Plants described in 1876 Category:Taxa named by Édouard André
title: Philodendron gloriosum
